name: Prasanth
description: I am a front-end enthusiast with a passion for building beautiful and functional websites. I enjoy bringing digital ideas to life, one line of code at a time. Exploring modern technologies to create engaging user experiences.

about.bio: Passionate developer with expertise in building scalable web applications and creating innovative solutions.
about.lookingFor: I’m a frontend developer exploring the backend world, eager to work with Java and Spring Boot to build scalable, high-performance applications. I’m passionate about learning Spring MVC, Spring Data JPA, Spring Security, RESTful APIs, Microservices architecture, Docker, and Kafka, and applying them to real-world projects. With experience in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React, I aim to contribute to full-stack development while continuously growing in a hands-on, collaborative environment.

projects.title: Cricket Stats App
projects.description: A web app to track cricket players and franchise stats.

projects.title: Pneumonia Detection using CNN
projects.description: This project uses Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) to detect pneumonia from chest X-ray images.
